data.lyric:
[ti:To Die For]
[ar:Sam Smith]
[al:To Die For]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]To Die For - Sam Smith
[00:01.12]Lyrics by：Sam Smith/Jimmy Napes/Mikkel S. Eriksen/Tor Hermansen
[00:02.24]Composed by：Sam Smith/Jimmy Napes/Mikkel S. Eriksen/Tor Hermansen
[00:03.36]It is if everyone dies alone
[00:06.65]Does that scare you
[00:09.61]I don't wanna be alone
[00:12.14]I look for you
[00:16.66]Every day every night
[00:23.34]I close my eyes
[00:27.76]From the fear from the light
[00:34.43]As I wander down the avenue so confused
[00:40.09]Guess I'll try and force a smile
[00:43.35]Pink lemonade sippin' on a Sunday
[00:46.36]Couples holding hands on a runway
[00:49.21]They're all posing in a picture frame
[00:51.73]Whilst my world's crashing down
[00:54.68]Solo shadow on a sidewalk
[00:57.54]Just want somebody to die for
[01:00.33]Sunshine livin' on a perfect day
[01:02.91]While my world's crashing down
[01:05.72]I just want somebody to die for
[01:10.84]I long for you
[01:15.35]Just a touch
[01:17.10]Does that scare you
[01:18.16]Of your hand
[01:21.62]You don't leave my mind
[01:26.52]Lonely days I'm feeling
[01:29.41]Like a fool for dreaming
[01:33.23]As I wander down the avenue so confused
[01:38.83]Guess I'll try to force a smile
[01:42.11]Pink lemonade sippin' on a Sunday
[01:45.08]Couples holding hands on a runway
[01:47.84]They're all posing in a picture frame
[01:50.55]Whilst my world's crashing down
[01:53.43]Solo shadow on a sidewalk
[01:56.27]Just want somebody to die for
[01:59.08]Sunshine livin' on a perfect day
[02:01.72]While my world's crashing down
[02:04.42]I just want somebody to die for
[02:10.23]I just want somebody to die for
[02:13.12]To die for
[02:15.79]I just want somebody to die for
[02:22.23]Does that scare you
[02:24.79]I don't wanna be alone
[02:29.57]Pink lemonade sippin' on a Sunday
[02:32.70]Couples holding hands on a runway
[02:34.88]Oh
[02:35.46]They're all posing in a picture frame
[02:38.04]Whilst my world's crashing down
[02:40.97]Solo shadow on a sidewalk
[02:43.78]Just want somebody to die for
[02:46.51]Sunshine livin' on a perfect day
[02:49.17]While my world's crashing down
[02:52.06]I just want somebody to die for
[02:57.47]I just want somebody to die for
[03:00.57]To die for
data.trans:
[ti:To Die For]
[ar:Sam Smith]
[al:To Die For]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.12]//
[00:02.24]//
[00:03.36]如果每个人都孤独终老
[00:06.65]你会害怕吗
[00:09.61]我不想孤单一个人
[00:12.14]寻找你
[00:16.66]每一个日夜
[00:23.34]闭上眼
[00:27.76]逃避恐惧和阳光
[00:34.43]徘徊街头 困惑不已
[00:40.09]我或许会强颜欢笑
[00:43.35]星期天 一个人喝着柠檬水
[00:46.36]情侣在路边牵着手
[00:49.21]摆好姿势拍照片
[00:51.73]而我的世界在崩塌
[00:54.68]形单影只 无人相伴
[00:57.54]只想找个值得为之付出生命的人
[01:00.33]阳光和煦 完美的一天
[01:02.91]而我的世界在崩塌
[01:05.72]我只想找个值得为之付出生命的人
[01:10.84]我期盼你
[01:15.35]只想轻轻触碰
[01:17.10]你会害怕吗
[01:18.16]你的手
[01:21.62]你始终在我心里
[01:26.52]孤独的日子 我感觉
[01:29.41]就像做白日梦的傻子
[01:33.23]徘徊街头 困惑不已
[01:38.83]或许我会强颜欢笑
[01:42.11]星期天 一个人喝着柠檬水
[01:45.08]情侣在路边牵着手
[01:47.84]摆好姿势拍照片
[01:50.55]而我的世界在崩塌
[01:53.43]形单影只 无人相伴
[01:56.27]只想找个值得为之付出生命的人
[01:59.08]阳光和煦 完美的一天
[02:01.72]而我的世界在崩塌
[02:04.42]我只想找个值得为之付出生命的人
[02:10.23]我只想找个值得为之付出生命的人
[02:13.12]为之付出生命
[02:15.79]我只想找个值得为之付出生命的人
[02:22.23]你会感到害怕吗
[02:24.79]我不想孤单一个人
[02:29.57]星期天 一个人喝着柠檬水
[02:32.70]情侣在路边牵着手
